issue.title: [Python] Add python bindings to ExecuteScalarExpression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17165](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17165). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, if a user wants to execute an expression, we require them to create an exec plan, add a project node, and then run the exec plan.  However, for simple use cases, where a user already has a record batch in memory, we could probably expose ExecuteScalarExpression on its own.
